definition: to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: Turn up the volume and listen closely.
Classic Fm is my favorite, please tune it in.
sentences.chinese: 古典调频电台是我的最爱，请调到那个频段。

sentences.english: The contrast of the computer screen is too low, please adjust it.
sentences.chinese: 显示器的对比度太低了，请调高一些吧。

sentences.english: Please regulate the sound on that radio.
sentences.chinese: 请调一下那个收音机的音量。

sentences.english: Please regulate the sound of the radio.
sentences.chinese: 请调一下收音机的声音。

sentences.english: Please call in police to restore order.
Raise the room temperature or use a blanket.
sentences.chinese: 所以请调高室内温度或盖一条毯子。

definition: to be transferred to another post/to post away
to supervise (troops)/to appoint (officers)/to select and assign
(army) commander-in-chief (archaic)/provincial military governor and civil administrator during the early Republic of China era (1911-1949 AD)
to do as one thinks fit/to handle by taking circumstances into consideration
to receive orders/to follow orders/to act under orders
